body_html:
Lots of these configs were moved out of the configure.py script. There are now more Bazel --config options specified in...
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tools/bazel.rc
...that you can use. I think this issue is now obsolete.
body_text:
Lots of these configs were moved out of the configure.py script. There are now more Bazel --config options specified in...
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tools/bazel.rc
...that you can use. I think this issue is now obsolete.
body:
Lots of these configs were moved out of the configure.py script. There are now more Bazel --config options specified in...
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tools/bazel.rc
...that you can use. I think this issue is now obsolete.
